content:
Anyone interested in a WSDL/XSD to StructureDefinition Logical Model stylesheet?
I have a first draft and interested if anyone else is as silly as me to have a need for it.
My use case is to use for creating StructureMaps to FHIR object models from an XML web service

Some example logical models generated by the XSLT
http://sqlonfhir-stu3.azurewebsites.net/fhir/StructureDefinition/nhsd-ExpandedAgencyData
http://sqlonfhir-stu3.azurewebsites.net/fhir/StructureDefinition/nhsd-ExpandedSiteData
http://sqlonfhir-stu3.azurewebsites.net/fhir/StructureDefinition/nhsd-ExpandedServiceData
http://sqlonfhir-stu3.azurewebsites.net/fhir/StructureDefinition/nhsd-ExpandedPracData

@Grahame Grieve Should the mapping language files be available here?
http://test.fhir.org/r3/StructureMap/Patient2to3
(in the STU3 StructureMap format - not the .map format)
